article_text:
Wagner, SD

The Wagner police Facebook page says officer Brian McGuire's CT scan shows no further signs of bleeding on the brain, but there is swelling on the back of his head.

Police say 55-year-old Richard Dean Golus of Lake Andes punched McGuire in the face during a traffic stop Friday night.

Golus is facing several charges including aggravated assault on a law enforcement officer, resisting arrest and ingesting a controlled substance.

He's being held in the Charles Mix County Jail.
